__e: Well, let's just get out of here before it happens again.
I wanted to see her, because I wanted to know she was looked after.
Then we can be away from here before they start to follow.
Why, so he can run off and lose all the money?
What kind of place is he running, letting an old dog like this get loose?
Fuck. Just enough so I can get lost, because I am fucking dead.
Except I'd get on out of town anyway if I was you.
I can't leave if I've still got a shot with her.
I'll leave he does that once more with me.
No, no, I was thinking that, too, but we'll just toke up here, and then we can leave, - and...
But you will still just run off and do whatever you want?
We will be if we don't get the hell out of here now, and I'm not taking him with us.
God, who do I have to kill so we can get out of here?
Didn't think we'd let you get away that easily, did you?
If we leave now, we could still catch the end of "it's a wonderful life" before her bedtime.
I just take you to jail. Man, I should have just run off with that money as soon as I had it.
I'm sorry. I shouldn't have left so fast. I just ...
I should've left with you when I had the chance.
